name: Utopia (itch) (devantics)
description:
I hope that you have the rights to control the bathyscaphe and you shoot as clearly as you say, otherwise your journey will end too early.

Your path will go through endless caves inhabited by ancient and terrible animals, which I will definitely not be glad that you disturbed them. You will explore hundreds of caves in search of treasures and artifacts, you will fight with animals that are not inferior to you in size, and of course, hope that you will find the answer to the question: how to find freedom for the whole world.

We are sure that you can handle it, but, just in case, let's start preparing another player.
